about_the_game:
Prepare for intense action, heart-pounding combat, and a fight for survival where every corner of the dungeon could be your last. Will you have what it takes to reclaim your lawn from the clutches of these parasitic fiends? The challenge is set, and the lawn is yours to protect!

In Dead on Your Lawn, you step into a fast-paced world where the dungeon isn't just any dungeon—it's your "lawn." The inhabitants of this dark, twisted place refer to their dangerous home as their lawn, and it's up to you to defend it. You'll face off against gruesome monsters—parasite-controlled corpses that want nothing more than to destroy you and your team.

The story kicks off with your character on the brink of death, only to be rescued by the Strong Warriors of Reclamation Division (S.W.O.R.D). Now, as a member of this elite team, you must fight to reclaim your lawn from the horrors that infest it. Your mission is clear: eliminate the infection, protect your territory, and ensure that the monsters stay dead on your lawn.

name: Dead On Your Lawn

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-1335U 1.30 GHz
  • Memory: 600 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 1000 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
